Author: skitof
Text: I feel you. Please, please don't stay if it's triggering to you -- I mostly come here to vent but the "I've been fasting for xyz days" posts are definitely not going to help you for your recovery. I wish you the best.❤️

Author: wild_banana_cookie
Text: I feel you on this. I only look at this sub occasionally or to vent now but otherwise when I spent too much time on it my ed was at its worst and my mood was also the worst it had been in a long time. A lot of the content here is so triggering it is not worth it.
